title: Top Hat
text: is a student engagement platform that professors use inside and outside of the classroom. In the web-based, eText system instructors can poll students, ask discussion prompts, present lecture material and track attendance.
featureText: Top Hat revolutionizes education with interactive teaching and learning through real-time feedback, customizable course content, and interactive textbooks. It enhances engagement, understanding, and community in the classroom. Its platform facilitates dynamic discussions and collaboration among students.

features.title: Top Hat Pages
features.text: This feature allows educators to personalize learning experiences by integrating dynamic content such as videos, quizzes, and interactive activities directly into their course materials.

features.title: Interactive Response Tools
features.text: Top Hat's interactive response tools are designed to maximize student engagement during lectures. This feature supports a wide range of response options, including multiple choice, word answer, numeric answer, and sorting, enabling students to actively participate in the learning process.

features.title: Customizable Textbooks
features.text: With access to hundreds of editable textbooks across various disciplines, Top Hat enables educators to tailor content to fit their specific course requirements. These customizable textbooks can be enhanced with interactive elements, such as embedded questions and multimedia resources, making learning more engaging for students.
